msbt.message: Thanks for the other day! Here's that gift I couldn't give you then. I woulda got it to you sooner, but the bugs under my floor were hungry for dinner. But ya got it now! A huh huh.
Thanks for the other day! You really did me a solid. So let me do a solid for you! Here's that present I couldn't give you then. It's solid!
Thanks for the other day! Here's that present I couldn't give you then. I was gonna pack it fulla cookies, but then I ate them 'cause I knew you'd want it that way and I like to make you happy.
